scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && concurrently 'npm run watch:typescript' 'npm run copy-assets'
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p ./dist/templates ./dist/resources ./dist/scripts && cp -r ./src/templates ./dist && cp -r ./src/resources ./dist && cp -r ./src/scripts ./dist && chokidar 'src/templates/**/*' -c 'cp -r ./src/templates ./dist' && chokidar 'src/resources/**/*' -c 'cp -r ./src/resources ./dist' && chokidar 'src/scripts/**/*' -c 'cp -r ./src/scripts ./dist'
